title: Elegant Antique Finish Diamond Haaram Set with Matching Jhumkas
materials: Sparkling CZ Diamonds. Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite set showcases a timeless design, featuring three strands of intricately crafted gold links. Each strand displays unique geometric and floral patterns, complemented by glittering CZ diamonds. The heart-shaped pendants add a touch of romance, while the tear-drop motif at the bottom enhances the overall elegance. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and stunning ensemble.
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning choice for bridal jewelry or to elevate your festive look during Sankranti or Diwali.
description: This haaram set blends traditional design elements with modern sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, while the unique geometric and floral patterns make it a standout piece. Versatile and timeless, this set is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
